ygData.subject: EQ guides
ygData.msgSnippet: Instead of having everyone pay $20-$50 for these Everquest guides for sale on the internet, why don t we post them in the files section.  I bought one, but I
ygData.messageBody:
Instead of having everyone pay $20-$50 for these Everquest guides for
sale on the internet, why don't we post them in the files section. I
bought one, but I forgot the URL they gave me. It was from
eqplatsecrets.com . It just described that you can get more plat for
selling a lot of cheap items than a few expensive items. It included
where to get Ry' Gorr armor and stuff like that.
Also, please don't waste space in here by telling everybody how
worthless these guides are. If you have one post it as a document in
the files section, and let everybody decide for themselves how useful
or worthless the guides are.
